properties.areaDesc: Vermilion to Avon Point OH; Willowick to Geneva-on-the Lake OH; Geneva-on-the-Lake to Conneaut OH; Conneaut OH to Ripley NY; Avon Point to Willowick OH
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 3:21AM EST until January 9 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 knots with gusts up to 35 knots and
waves 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Portions of central Lake Erie.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 4 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Small Craft Advisory currently in
effect has been cancelled due to winds and waves decreasing to
below criteria. There will be a lull in winds and waves until a
surface trough moves east across the lake this
afternoon/evening, which is when strong westerly winds pick back
up over Lake Erie.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST THURSDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
